entities.name: unfogging the future
entities.description: A book that provides guidance and interpretation of omens and signs. It is consulted by Ron to understand Harry's future.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley, a friend of Harry's who uses the teacup reading method to interpret omens and signs from Unfogging the Future.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter, the main character whose future is being interpreted by Ron using the teacup reading method.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney, a teacher at Hogwarts who is known for her ability to interpret omens and signs. She is mentioned as someone who can test Harry's Inner Eye.

entities.name: inner eye
entities.description: A concept that refers to the ability to see and understand omens and signs. Professor Trelawney suggests that Harry needs his Inner Eye tested.

relationships.description: Ron uses Unfogging the Future to interpret omens and signs for Harry's future.
Ron interprets omens and signs from Unfogging the Future to understand Harry's future.
Professor Trelawney suggests that she can test Harry's Inner Eye, implying that she has the ability to assess and develop this concept.
